page.title: 14A Typical Day
page.content: On a typical weekday in the school term I get up at 7.45 and get my breakfast for myself (usually it's a plate of cereal). Then I go to my granny's shop to get a pint of milk for the school. We start school at 9.00 and we might get RE with Miss Steedman, the infant teacher,followed by sums with our own teacher until break at 10.45. At break we usually play football. After break we might get reading work cards or topic work till lunch at 12.30. I have a packed lunch in school and then play football again until 1.30. After lunch we might get PE or write a story until break at 2.30. Then we have another session until school stops at 3.30. Then I go home, get a bite to eat, get changed and go out to play until 5.15 when I come in for tea.Then I play and watch TV until bed time at 10 or 10.30.
